verses.verse: <S%G3972>Paul,<s%> a <S%G1198>prisoner<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> and <S%G5095>Timothy<s%> our <S%G80>brother,<s%> to <S%G5371>Philemon<s%> our dearly <S%G27>beloved,<s%> and fellow <S%G4904>laborer,<s%>
And to our <S%G27>beloved<s%> <S%G682>Apphia,<s%> and <S%G751>Archippus<s%> our fellow <S%G4961>soldier,<s%> and to the <S%G1577>church<s%> in your <S%G3624>house:<s%>
<S%G5485>Grace<s%> to you, and <S%G1515>peace,<s%> from <S%G2316>God<s%> our <S%G3962>Father<s%> and the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ.<s%>
I <S%G2168>thank<s%> my <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G4160>making<s%> <S%G3417>mention<s%> of you <S%G3842>always<s%> in my <S%G4335>prayers,<s%>

<S%G191>Hearing<s%> of your <S%G26>love<s%> and <S%G4102>faith,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> you <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G4314>toward<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> and <S%G1519>toward<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G40>saints;<s%>

That the <S%G2842>communication<s%> of your <S%G4102>faith<s%> may <S%G1096>become<s%> <S%G1756>effectual<s%> by the <S%G1922>acknowledging<s%> of <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G18>good<s%> thing <S%G3588>which<s%> is in you in <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus.<s%>

For we <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G4183>great<s%> <S%G5485>joy<s%> and <S%G3874>consolation<s%> in your <S%G26>love,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> the <S%G4698>bowels<s%> of the <S%G40>saints<s%> are <S%G373>refreshed<s%> by you, <S%G80>brother.<s%>
<S%G1352>Why,<s%> though I might be <S%G4183>much<s%> <S%G3954>bold<s%> in <S%G5547>Christ<s%> to <S%G2004>enjoin<s%> you that which is <S%G433>convenient,<s%>

Yet for <S%G26>love's<s%> sake I <S%G3123>rather<s%> <S%G3870>beseech<s%> you, <S%G5607>being<s%> <S%G5108>such<s%> an one as <S%G3972>Paul<s%> the <S%G4246>aged,<s%> and <S%G3570>now<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> a <S%G1198>prisoner<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ.<s%>
I <S%G3870>beseech<s%> you for my <S%G5043>son<s%> <S%G3682>Onesimus,<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> I have <S%G1080>begotten<s%> in my <S%G1199>bonds:<s%>
<S%G3588>Which<s%> in <S%G4218>time<s%> past was to you <S%G890>unprofitable,<s%> but <S%G3570>now<s%> <S%G2173>profitable<s%> to you and to me:
<S%G3739>Whom<s%> I have <S%G375>sent<s%> <S%G375>again:<s%> you therefore <S%G4355>receive<s%> him, that is, <S%G1699>my<s%> own <S%G4698>bowels:<s%>
<S%G3739>Whom<s%> I would have <S%G2722>retained<s%> with me, that in your <S%G5228>stead<s%> he might have <S%G1247>ministered<s%> to me in the <S%G1199>bonds<s%> of the <S%G2098>gospel:<s%>

But <S%G5565>without<s%> your <S%G1106>mind<s%> <S%G2309>would<s%> I <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G3762>nothing;<s%> that your <S%G18>benefit<s%> should not be as it were of <S%G318>necessity,<s%> but <S%G2596>willingly.<s%> <S%G1595><s%>
For <S%G5029>perhaps<s%> he <S%G1223>therefore<s%> <S%G5124><s%> <S%G5563>departed<s%> for a <S%G5610>season,<s%> that you should <S%G568>receive<s%> him for <S%G166>ever;<s%>

Not <S%G3765>now<s%> as a <S%G1401>servant,<s%> but <S%G5228>above<s%> a <S%G1401>servant,<s%> a <S%G80>brother<s%> <S%G27>beloved,<s%> <S%G3122>specially<s%> to me, but <S%G4214>how<s%> <S%G4214>much<s%> <S%G3123>more<s%> to you, <S%G2532>both<s%> in the <S%G4561>flesh,<s%> and in the <S%G2962>Lord?<s%>
<S%G1487>If<s%> you <S%G2192>count<s%> me <S%G3767>therefore<s%> a <S%G2844>partner,<s%> <S%G4355>receive<s%> him as <S%G1691>myself.<s%>
<S%G1487>If<s%> he has <S%G91>wronged<s%> you, <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G3784>owes<s%> you <S%G5100>ought,<s%> <S%G1677>put<s%> that <S%G1677>on<s%> <S%G1699>my<s%> <S%G1677>account;<s%>

I <S%G3972>Paul<s%> have <S%G1125>written<s%> it with my own <S%G5495>hand,<s%> I will <S%G661>repay<s%> it: <S%G2443>albeit<s%> I do not <S%G3004>say<s%> to you <S%G3754>how<s%> you <S%G4359>owe<s%> to me <S%G2532>even<s%> <S%G4572>your<s%> <S%G4572>own<s%> <S%G4572>self<s%> <S%G4359>besides.<s%>
<S%G3483>Yes,<s%> <S%G80>brother,<s%> let me have <S%G3685>joy<s%> of you in the <S%G2962>Lord:<s%> <S%G373>refresh<s%> my <S%G4698>bowels<s%> in the <S%G2962>Lord.<s%>

Having <S%G3982>confidence<s%> in your <S%G5218>obedience<s%> I <S%G1125>wrote<s%> to you, <S%G1492>knowing<s%> that you will <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G5228>more<s%> <S%G5228>than<s%> I <S%G3004>say.<s%>

But <S%G260>with<s%> <S%G2090>prepare<s%> me <S%G2532>also<s%> a <S%G3578>lodging:<s%> for I <S%G1679>trust<s%> that <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G4335>prayers<s%> I shall be <S%G5483>given<s%> to you.
There <S%G782>salute<s%> you <S%G1889>Epaphras,<s%> my fellow <S%G4869>prisoner<s%> in <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus;<s%>
<S%G3138>Marcus,<s%> <S%G708>Aristarchus,<s%> <S%G1214>Demas,<s%> Lucas, my fellow <S%G4904>laborers.<s%>

The <S%G5485>grace<s%> of our <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> be with <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G4151>spirit.<s%> <S%G281>Amen.<s%> Written from Rome to Philemon, by Onesimus a servant.
